en.title: Free Duplicate Line Remover - Clean Text Tool
en.metaDescription: Remove duplicate lines from text instantly with advanced options. Case sensitive, trim lines, keep first/last, and preserve order. Perfect for data cleaning and text processing.

intro.title: Free Duplicate Line Remover - Clean Text Tool
intro.content: Remove duplicate lines from your text with powerful options including case sensitivity, line trimming, and order preservation. Perfect for cleaning data, removing duplicates, and text processing with detailed analytics.

items.title: Advanced Options
items.description: Case sensitive comparison, line trimming, and order preservation

items.title: Flexible Processing
items.description: Keep first or last occurrence of duplicate lines

items.title: Real-time Analytics
items.description: Detailed statistics showing original, unique, and removed lines

items.title: File Upload Support
items.description: Process entire text files with duplicate line removal

items.title: Copy & Download
items.description: Easily copy results or download cleaned text files

items.title: Privacy-First
items.description: All processing happens locally in your browser

useCases.title: Popular Uses for Duplicate Line Removal
useCases.description: Common scenarios where duplicate line removal is essential.

items.title: Data Cleaning
items.description: Clean datasets by removing duplicate entries and redundant information.

items.title: Log File Processing
items.description: Remove duplicate log entries to reduce file size and improve readability.

items.title: Text Processing

items.title: Code Deduplication

howToUse.title: How to Remove Duplicate Lines
howToUse.description: Follow these simple steps to clean your text.

steps.title: Enter Your Text
steps.description: Paste your text or upload a file containing duplicate lines.

steps.title: Configure Options
steps.description: Choose case sensitivity, line trimming, and whether to keep first or last occurrence.

steps.title: Review Analytics
steps.description: Check the detailed statistics showing original, unique, and removed line counts.

steps.title: Copy or Download
steps.description: Copy the cleaned text or download it as a file for further use.

examples.description: See how different types of text are cleaned.

benefits.title: Why Use Our Duplicate Line Remover
benefits.content: Professional duplicate line removal with comprehensive analytics and flexible options.
items: Works with all text formats and languages

faqs.question: What is duplicate line removal?
faqs.answer: Duplicate line removal is the process of identifying and removing repeated lines from text, keeping only unique entries.

faqs.question: What's the difference between case sensitive and case insensitive?
faqs.answer: Case sensitive treats 'Hello' and 'hello' as different lines, while case insensitive treats them as the same.

faqs.question: Can I process large files?
faqs.answer: Yes, our tool can handle large text files efficiently with real-time processing and detailed analytics.

faqs.question: Is my data private?
faqs.answer: Yes, all text processing happens locally in your browser. Your data is never uploaded to our servers.

items.description: Remove unwanted line breaks from text

Работает со всеми форматами текста и языками

faqs.question: Что такое удаление дубликатов строк?
faqs.answer: Удаление дубликатов строк - это процесс поиска и удаления повторяющихся строк из текста, оставляя только уникальные записи.

faqs.question: В чем разница между учетом и игнорированием регистра?
faqs.answer: Учет регистра рассматривает 'Привет' и 'привет' как разные строки, а игнорирование регистра - как одинаковые.

faqs.question: Можно ли обрабатывать большие файлы?
faqs.answer: Да, наш инструмент эффективно обрабатывает большие текстовые файлы с аналитикой в реальном времени.

faqs.question: Данные приватны?
faqs.answer: Да, вся обработка текста происходит локально в вашем браузере. Ваши данные никогда не загружаются на наши серверы.

faqs.question: Was ist Duplikate-Zeilen-Entfernung?
faqs.answer: Duplikate-Zeilen-Entfernung ist der Prozess der Identifizierung und Entfernung wiederholter Zeilen aus Text, wobei nur einzigartige Einträge beibehalten werden.

faqs.question: Was ist der Unterschied zwischen Groß-/Kleinschreibung beachten und nicht beachten?
faqs.answer: Groß-/Kleinschreibung beachten behandelt 'Hallo' und 'hallo' als unterschiedliche Zeilen, während nicht beachten sie als gleich behandelt.

faqs.question: Kann ich große Dateien verarbeiten?
faqs.answer: Ja, unser Tool kann große Textdateien effizient mit Echtzeit-Verarbeitung und detaillierter Analytik verarbeiten.

faqs.question: Sind meine Daten privat?
faqs.answer: Ja, alle Textverarbeitung erfolgt lokal in Ihrem Browser. Ihre Daten werden niemals auf unsere Server hochgeladen.
